short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds filter buttons to Google™ search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds back the discussions button to Google search results, which enables you to search forums and message boards.

Update: Google has since outright disabled the discussion search functionality. As a workaround, the discussions link will now modify your search query and add some relevant filters.

Source code - 
https://github.com/stri8ed/google-search-discussions

New in 1.4.10
• Added options page. Toggle between original "Forums" button, and discussion filters.
• Fixed extension to work with latest version of Google.
